comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Registers a new GameTest function that is designed for asynchronous execution.
This GameTest will become available in Minecraft via /gametest run [testClassName]:[testName].

comments.name: param
comments.value: Name of the class of tests this test should be a part of.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns a {@link RegistrationBuilder} object where additional options for this test can be specified via builder methods.
